C

Chapa - Class in com.yaphet.chapa
The Chapa class is responsible for making GET and POST request to Chapa API to initialize a transaction, verify a transaction and create a sub account.
Chapa(String) - Constructor for class com.yaphet.chapa.Chapa
 
Chapa(ChapaClient, String) - Constructor for class com.yaphet.chapa.Chapa
 
ChapaClient - Interface in com.yaphet.chapa.client
A client to interact with Chapa API.
ChapaClientImpl - Class in com.yaphet.chapa.client
A default implementation of ChapaClient.
ChapaClientImpl() - Constructor for class com.yaphet.chapa.client.ChapaClientImpl
 
ChapaException - Exception in com.yaphet.chapa.exception
A ChapaException is thrown to signal a problem during SDK execution.
ChapaException(String) - Constructor for exception com.yaphet.chapa.exception.ChapaException
 
ChapaException(Throwable) - Constructor for exception com.yaphet.chapa.exception.ChapaException
 
ChapaException(String, Throwable) - Constructor for exception com.yaphet.chapa.exception.ChapaException

createSubAccount(SubAccount) - Method in class com.yaphet.chapa.Chapa
